query:
SELECT user_id, username, COALESCE(total_points, 0)::INT as "total_points!"
        FROM (
            SELECT
                USERS.ID AS user_id,
                USERS.USERNAME,
                SUM(PICKS.POINTS) AS TOTAL_POINTS
            FROM
                USERS
                JOIN PICKS ON USERS.ID = PICKS.USER_ID
            WHERE
                PICKS.CHAPTER_ID = $1
            GROUP BY
                USERS.ID,
                USERS.USERNAME
        ) AS sub
        ORDER BY total_points
